description: Associates a canary with a group. Using groups can help you with managing and automating your canaries, and you can also view aggregated run results and statistics for all canaries in a group. You must run this operation in the Region where the canary exists.

parameters.name: GroupIdentifier
parameters.description: Specifies the group. You can specify the group name, the ARN, or the group ID as the GroupIdentifier.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the canary that you want to associate with the specified group.
